name: SuperWarmforSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on my light”
”Alexa, turn off my light”
”Alexa, set my light to yellow”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Super Warm is now part of Alexa Connected Home. You can now voice control your appliances by simply saying:

Turn on/off 
"Alexa, turn on my light"
"Alexa, turn off my light"

Color Changing
"Alexa, set my light to yellow"
"Alexa, set my light to purple"

Color Temperature
"Alexa, set my light to warm white"
"Alexa, set my light to cool white"

Brightness
"Alexa, set my light to 10 percent"

To get started:
1, You'll need a Super Warm device.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our Super Warm App which can be downloaded at Google Play or App Store. 

After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
